title: Lil Scrappy & Erica Dixon Spark Reunion Rumors With Aruba Vacation
text: For months, [Lil Scrappy](/profile/lil-scrappy) and his ex Erica Dixon have had fans convinced that they've rekindled their romance. Though the former pair denies being back together, followers continue to speculate about their social media posts, which make it clear that [they're on good terms](/754980-erica-dixon-lil-scrappy-birthday-hip-hop-news). Earlier this week, for example, each of them shared some fun footage from a recent trip to Aruba they took together. In the footage, the duo is seen [lounging on the beach](/735816-lil-scrappy-erica-dixon-relationship-timeline), enjoying nice meals together, getting massages, going scuba diving, and more. It's unclear whether their daughter or any of Lil Scrappy's other children accompanied them on the trip. Read More: [Momma Dee Obtains Bambi's Birth Certificate, Accuses Her Of Lying About Her Age](/769148-momma-dee-bambis-birth-certificate-hip-hop-news) Lil Scrappy & Erica Dixon Travel Together "Onna lil quick trip with my dawg and we had a time jack," Scrappy captioned the video. "Had a blast . #FirstTimeInAruba2024 #memories #lovelivelife." While it's certainly possible that the co-parents were just getting in some valuable bonding time as friends, commenters have their doubts. ["He needs to marry u ASAP ,"](/766140-lil-scrappy-love-declaration-erica-dixon-pop-culture-news) one fan writes in Dixon's comments section. "If gimme my man back was a person," another claims. This isn't the first time Lil Scrappy and Erica Dixon got fans talking about one of their vacations, however. Last year, the two of them [visited Hawaii together](/724899-lil-scrappy-erica-dixon-hawaii-hip-hop-news), prompting rumors that they were an item once again. "Me and Emani's father are cool," Dixon said at the time. "We are family, we're in a good space. Some of y'all be some weirdos. Like, I'm big on accountability moving forward. I ultimately have to have a relationship and deal with him forever because we do share a child." What do you think of Lil Scrappy and Erica Dixon's recent vacation in Aruba? What about rumors that the trip means they're more than just co-parents? Share your thoughts in the comments section down below, and keep an eye on HNHH for more updates.
